abstract: Shareholders of Dow Jones & Company gave their blessing to a takeover by Rupert Murdoch’s global media empire, the News Corporation.
snippet: Shareholders of Dow Jones & Company gave their blessing to a takeover by Rupert Murdoch’s global media empire, the News Corporation.
lead_paragraph: Rupert Murdoch won his long-coveted prize Thursday when shareholders of Dow Jones & Company gave their blessing to a takeover by Mr. Murdoch’s global media empire, the News Corporation.

headline.main: News Corp. Completes Takeover of Dow Jones
headline.print_headline: News Corp. Completes Takeover of Dow Jones
